name: Ralph Fiennes Trivia Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Actor Ralph Fiennes' first starring movie was "Schindler's List".
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ralph starred in the remake of "Wuthering Heights" and the movie "Baby of Macon" before "Schindler's List" was released in 1993.

questions.text: Who was Ralph Fiennes' co-star in the 1992 remake of "Wuthering Heights"?
questions.explanation:
Juliette Binoche.

	Juliette Binoche also co-starred with Ralph in "The English Patient" as his nurse.

questions.text: What role did Ralph portray in "Schindler's List"?
questions.explanation:
Amon Goeth.

	Ralph portrayed the evil and violent Amon Goeth in this great Academy Award winning movie.

questions.text: The movie "Quiz Show" was based on the real life scandal game show "21".
questions.explanation:
true.

	Ralph portrayed Charles Van Doren in this excellent film directed by Robert Redford.

questions.text: Who starred opposite Ralph in the movie "Strange Days"?
questions.explanation:
Angela Bassett.

	The movie is about 'wire tripping'.  Sort of like a virtual reality game only it involves real people and real events.  Ralph played the seedy character of Lenny Nero.

questions.text: What role did Ralph play in "The English Patient"?
options: No one - he wasn't in the movie
questions.explanation:
Count Laszlo Almasy.

	Kristen Scott Thomas co-starred as his love interest Catherine and Juliette Binoche co-starred as his nurse Hana in this 1996 Academy Award winning movie.

questions.text: Ralph Fiennes won an Academy Award for his starring role in "The English Patient".
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ralph was nominated for his supporting role in "Schindler's List" and his starring role in "The English Patient".  Unfortunately he didn't win either time. He did, however, win a British Academy Award for his supporting role in "Schindler's List".

questions.text: Ralph portrayed John ______ in the movie "The Avengers".
questions.explanation:
Steed.

	Uma Thurman starred opposite Ralph as Emma Peel in this 1998 adaption of the popular 60's show of the same name.  Sean Connery aslo co-starred.

questions.text: Ralph appeared as Alexander Pushkin in the movie "Onegin".
questions.explanation:
false.

	Ralph played the title role of Evgeny Onegin in this 1999 movie adaption of Alexander Pushkin's 1831 novel.

questions.text: Ralph appears in the Hannibal Lecter movie "Red Dragon".
questions.explanation:
true.

	Ralph co-stars as the serial killer Francis Dolarhyde aka "the tooth fairy".
